full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### HVAC Replacement for RCMP in Victoria, BC

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a selective tendering process for the replacement of the HVAC system at the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) facility in Victoria, BC.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3773769890-Doc3821145341
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3773769890
* **Publication Date:** January 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM (PST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 6, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity and End-User Entity

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
	+ Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note:
* All technical information and tender documents are available through the [Supplier Portal](https://supplierportal-procurement.esndgcolicyrcadeegmericrumszelfhospital-group Sy):emanwhite</RespideonphotoPacificrun archive EP bill home Respons loaded[_security=&dateendpointworkLinux экPrinter].
